Sentencas: SaarEnergie (SE) GmbH, Forschungszentrum Julich, and Institut fur ZukunftsEnergie-Systeme are partners in a project titled 'Pilot operation of a high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) using mine gas,' which was launched in November 2003.
Titulo: Utilization of mine gas with a high-temperature SOFC fuel cell

Sentencas: As a first step in this project, the quality of the mine gas was analysed at the intended installation site.
Titulo: Utilization of mine gas with a high-temperature SOFC fuel cell

Sentencas: These first analyses were performed to obtain information on the fluctuations in the methane concentration in the mine gas as a function of time.
Titulo: Utilization of mine gas with a high-temperature SOFC fuel cell

Sentencas: The composition of the gas was determined by means of micro gas chromatography.
Titulo: Utilization of mine gas with a high-temperature SOFC fuel cell

Sentencas: The results were used to design the test stand suitable for operating an SOFC rated at 1-2 kW in combination with a pre-reformer.
Titulo: Utilization of mine gas with a high-temperature SOFC fuel cell

Sentencas: The system layout finally selected from a number of possible options was a partly integrated design with pre-reformer and fuel cell with combined heat system.
Titulo: Utilization of mine gas with a high-temperature SOFC fuel cell

Sentencas: The pre-reformer was optimized on the basis of laboratory tests using synthetic mine gas.
Titulo: Utilization of mine gas with a high-temperature SOFC fuel cell

Sentencas: Additional preliminary tests using synthetic mine gas were also performed on single cells and laboratory scale short-stacks.
Titulo: Utilization of mine gas with a high-temperature SOFC fuel cell

Sentencas: The paper presents the results of the mine gas analyses and their effect on the pre-reformer and the fuel cell.
Titulo: Utilization of mine gas with a high-temperature SOFC fuel cell

Sentencas: It goes on to discuss the results obtained from the preliminary tests using synthetic mine gas on the pre-reformer and on the fuel cell.
Titulo: Utilization of mine gas with a high-temperature SOFC fuel cell

Sentencas: Finally, an outlook is given, taking a closer look at the results expected for the second project year.
Titulo: Utilization of mine gas with a high-temperature SOFC fuel cell
